Affix.Name: Instructor
Affix.Desc: Upon triggering an Elemental Reaction, increases all party members' Elemental Mastery by 120 for 8s.

EQUIP_RING.Name: Instructor's Tea Cup
EQUIP_RING.Desc: It may seem like an ordinary tea cup to most. But to students, it is the symbol of the instructor's authority.

EQUIP_NECKLACE.Name: Instructor's Feather Accessory
EQUIP_NECKLACE.Desc: Any instructor who has mastered the art of de-escalation knows to keep this accessory firmly in their grasp at all times.

EQUIP_DRESS.Name: Instructor's Cap
EQUIP_DRESS.Desc: A standard-issue honorary instructor's cap, only granted to those who turn down a promotion.

EQUIP_BRACER.Name: Instructor's Brooch
EQUIP_BRACER.Desc: Whenever the instructor wore this brooch, it meant there would be no training sessions that day.

EQUIP_SHOES.Name: Instructor's Pocket Watch
EQUIP_SHOES.Desc: A stopwatch used not for general timekeeping but to measure the duration of a training session.
